2.「……待たせちゃったかしら？| 急な お誘いだったのに| 来てくれて ありがとう: Did I keep you waiting? Thank you for coming|on such short notice, I'm so glad you could|make it.

3.「私……気球に乗るのが 夢だったのよ。| だから 期間限定で 気球に乗れるって聞: I've always dreamed of going on a balloon|ride. So when I heard that it was available|for a limited time, I made a reservation.

4.「それと 前から あなたと| のんびり 過ごしてみたかったから……| 一緒に ど: Also, I've always wanted to spend some quality|time with you, so I was wondering if you'd|like to join me.

7.「おお そなた 無事だったか！| アンルシア姫も よくやってくれた！: Oh, you're safe! Princess Anlucia,|you did great!

8.「……ええ 危機一髪のところでした。| ルシェンダさまの おかげです。| けれど: Yes, it was a close call, thanks to you,|Lushenda. But... Pyuju got away.

9.「そうだ！ ルシェンダさま。| 彼女の荷物は 無事ですか？| ピュージュが 狙っ: Oh, right! Lushenda, is her luggage safe?|It looked like Pyuju was after it...

10.「荷物自体は 無事のようだが……| 何かを 盗られた 恐れがあるのか？| ならば: The luggage itself appears to be safe, but is|it possible that something was stolen?|If so, you may want to check it out.

12.<pc>の だいじなものの中から|時元神キュロノスが 落とした|戦禍のタネが な: The Evil War Seed dropped by Time God Kyuronos|was missing from <pc>'s Key Items!

15.「……ふむ そうか。そなたたちには| 戦禍のタネについて 教えてなかったな。|: ...Hmm, right. I didn't tell you about the|Evil War Seed. Then I will tell you what I|know.

16.「ガートラントの事件を 覚えているか？| ピュージュが そっくりの偽者をあやつる:
Do you remember the incident in Gartlant? The|one in which Pyuju controlled lookalikes to|create chaos in the country by inciting a|
|civil war?

17.「私は ガートラント王国と 懇意にしていてな。| ピュージュが 事件を起こして以:
I am on friendly terms with the Kingdom of|Gartlant. Ever since the incident with Pyuju,|I've been secretly trying to find out what|
|he's up to.

18.「その結果…… ピュージュは どうやら| あるものを求めて 各地に 争いの火種を: As it turned out, Pyuju had been fanning the|flames of conflict throughout the land in|search of something. And that thing was...

20.「うむ。戦禍のタネは 魔瘴に関わる戦いにより| 生まれる 戦いの怨念と魔瘴が|: Yes. Evil War Seeds are said to be born from|battles involving miasma, and are ripened by|both miasma and the grudges of those battles.

21.「ピュージュは 人々をだまし 争いを起こしては| たくさんの戦禍のタネを 生みだ: It seems that Pyuju has been manipulating|people and causing conflicts to create and|gather Evil War Seeds.

22.「そんなことが あったなんて……。| でも ピュージュは なんのために……？: So something like that has been going on...|But what is Pyuju trying to do...?

23.「そういえば……地獄の扉が 開かれて| 災いが あふれ出す……と| ピュージュは: Speaking of which...Pyuju said that the doors|of hell would open, and disaster would|pour forth.

25.「……どうやら 事態は 切迫しているようだ。| これは 一刻も早く ピュージュか: ...It seems that the situation is becoming|more urgent. We must get the Evil War Seed|back from Pyuju as soon as possible...

31.「ピュージュどもは ふた手に分かれ| 依然 海上を飛行しながら 逃走中です！|: The Pyujus have split up, and are currently|fleeing across the sea! One of them is headed|to one of the uninhabited Wena Islands...

33.「早くしないと ピュージュを逃してしまうわ。| けれど ２匹のうち どちらが戦禍: If we don't do something fast, we'll lose|Pyuju. But we don't know which of the two took|the Evil War Seed...

35.「そなたは ゲルト海峡へと逃げた| ピュージュのほうを 追いかけるのだ。: And you will go after the Pyuju who has fled|to Gert Strait.

40.「ゲルト海峡に浮かぶ小島……ガミルゴの盾島では| 島に空いた 大きな穴を 石化し: The small island off Gert Strait... Gamilgo's|Shield Isle, is said to hold a petrified giant|that is blocking a great pit.

42.「術士ガミルゴは 他でもない 私の先祖でな。| なぜだか 無性に 胸騒ぎがするの: Gamilgo is, of all people, my ancestor.|That's probably why I feel so anxious.

43.「我が身に流れる 父祖の血が| 危機を知らせているような……。: It's as if the blood of my ancestor is trying|to warn me of danger...

45.「あはは♪ もうすこしで……| あのお方の願いを かなえることができる♪| とっ: Ahaha! Just a little longer... and "their"|wish will be fulfilled! And then, something|wonderful will happen!

|forward to the opening!

67.「……気に入った。| お前の命 救ってやろう。: ...I like you. I'll save your life.

95.「ゲルヘナ幻野は 起伏が多く 迷いやすいが……| 魔界に慣れるためにも 自力で来:
Gerhena Field has many ups and downs, and it's|easy to get lost... but to get used to the|Demon World, you'll have to get there|
|yourself. I'll be waiting at the Demongate.

96.「ちゃんと ここまで 来られたか。| あれが魔仙卿が住む デモンマウンテンの入り: So you made it this far. That's the|Demongate... the entrance to Demon Mountain|where the Oracle resides. Come, this way.

|Great Demon King and the source of darkness.

101.「……ゲッファッファ！！ バカヤロウ！！| 次の 大魔王になんのはァ オレ様ァ|: ...Gehahah! Fool! The next Great Demon King|will be me, Killer Grevos!

118.「ゼクレスと バルディスタの魔王に会って| ここ 大審門へと 引きずり出す。|: I will meet with the Demon Kings of both|Zechres and Valdista, and drag them both here|to the Demongate. That is my mission.

Unfortunately, once a person has entered into|a blood contract and transformed into a demon,|they can never return to their original form.|
|That's the Demon World's way.

121.「……だが たったひとりだけ| 魔族となったお前を 元に戻しうる者がいる。| こ: ...There's only one person who can change you|back from your demon form... and that's the|Oracle that lives beyond this gate.

122.「ということは……大審門を開けるという| 俺の目的を果たせば 元の姿に戻るという: In other words...if I achieve my goal of|opening the Demongate, you'll reach your goal|of getting back to normal.

124.「ゲルヘナ幻野の東には 魔王アスバルがいる| ゼクレス魔導国…… 西に向かえば|: To the east of Gerhena Field is Zechres, home|to Demon King Asbal... and to the west is|Demon King Valeria's Fortress Valdista.

125.「２国のうち どちらからでも かまわない。| お前に 好きなほうを選ばせてやる。: I don't care which of the 2 nations we pick|first. I'll let you decide that. Now then,|shall we begin our tour of the Demon World?

127.「ほら 見て！| 大風車塔が もう あんなに遠くに！: Look, look! The Great Windmill Tower is|already so far away!

128.「……ねえ。| 思えば 私たち 一緒に| たくさんの冒険を してきたわよね。: Hey... Thinking back, we've had many|adventures together, haven't we?

129.「いろいろと つらいことも あったけれど| あなたが いてくれたから| いつも: There have been many hard times, but because|of you, I have always been able to get through|them.

132.「……あなたにとって 私との関係は| 勇者と盟友…… だけなのかな？| それとも: To you, is our relationship only that of a|hero and ally? Or... do you think I'm someone|special?|<select_nc>|Someone special|Hero and ally|<select_end>|<case 1>|<close>|<case 2>|<close>|<case_cancel>|<close>|<case_end>

135.「そう…… そうなのね。| な…なんだか てれちゃうわね。: I see... I see. I'm blushing a little.

136.「まさか あなたも 同じ気持ちで| いてくれたなんて……うれしいわ。: I can't believe you feel the same way...|it's nice to know.

141.「間に合って よかったわ！: Good thing we made it in time!

143.「……あはは♪| ホンモノが 来ちゃったなら 仕方ないな～♪: ...Ahaha! If the real one's here,|then I guess it can't be helped!

146.「やあやあ！ 盟友くん ひさしぶり～♪| 旅芸人ピュージュの ドッキリショーは|: Hey there! It's been a while, ally! I hope|you enjoyed Minstrel Pyuju's surprise show!

147.「あなたが…… ガートラントで| 陰謀を仕掛けたという ピュージュ……！: You... you're Pyuju, the one who was|conspiring in Gartlant...!

148.「あはは♪ 勇者姫は はじめましてだね！| 知ってもらえてるなんて 光栄だな～♪: Ahaha! It's nice to meet you, Hero Princess!|I'm honored that you know me, and came all the|way out here just to see me!

149.「でもでも 残念ながら……| もう キミたちに 用はないんだよな～♪: But alas... we have no more use for you...

150.「ボクたちの目的は そこの彼女が| 気球に乗る前に 置いてってくれた| 荷物の中: Our goal was in the luggage she left for us|before our little balloon ride....

151.「えっ ふたり いる……？| どういうこと……！？: There's two of them...? What's going on...!?

152.「あはは♪ これで 必要な分がそろったんだ！| ボクらの大願が まもなく かなう: Ahaha! Now all the pieces are in place! Soon|our desire will be fulfilled, and then,|something really scary will happen!

153.「……地獄の扉が 開かれて| 恐ろしい 災いが あふれ出すよ♪| きっと たくさ: The gates of hell will open, and a terrible|calamity will pour forth! I'm sure that there|will be much bloodshed!

156.「……ところで。| あなた すっかり だまされていたようだけど| 偽者の私……何: By the way... You were fooled by that fake|me... Did they say anything weird?<yesno><close>

158.「……えっ そうなの。| 私を 特別な人と 思っているのか……って| 聞かれたの: ...Oh, I see. They asked if you thought I was|special. Hmm...

159.「それで……| あなたは なんて答え……: So... what did you tell them?

160.「ううん。やっぱり いい！| 今のは 聞かなかったことにして！: No, never mind! Pretend you didn't hear that!

161.「……ごめんなさい。| 今は こんな話 してる場合じゃなかったわね。: ...Sorry. Now's not the time to talk about|this.

162.「じつは 私が出かけてる時 ルシェンダさまから| あなたが 危ないという 連絡が: Actually, when I headed out, I got a call from|Lady Lushenda that you might be in danger,|so I rushed right over.

163.「下で ルシェンダさまが 待っておられるわ。| いったん 戻りましょう。: Lushenda is waiting for us below.|Let's head back.

164.「魔界には 現在| 特に大きなチカラを持った ３つの国がある。: In the Demon World, there are currently three|nations with particularly great power.

165.「魔界で最も古き 悪意の都 ゼクレス魔導国。: Zechres, the most ancient and malevolent city|in the Demon World.

167.<pc>は アビスジュエルを|使えるようになった！<me 71>: <pc> can now use the Abyss Jewel!<me 71>

168.<color_yellow>メインコマンドの 『どうぐ』の中にある|『アビスジュ: <color_yellow>The Abyss Jewel in the Items menu allows you|to travel between Astoltia and the|Demon World.<color_white>

169.<color_yellow>さらに 魔界で訪れた場所が 登録されるほか|各地にあ: <color_yellow>In addition to visiting registered places in|the Demon World, you can also register new|places by examining the "Abyss Gates" in each area.<color_white>

In the Demon World, you can use the Abyss|Jewel with a roof over your head. You can also|choose "Return to Astoltia" to go back to the|
|place most associated with you.

171.<color_yellow>なお アビスジュエルの追加により|『エテーネルキュー: <color_yellow>Note that with the addition of the|Abyss Jewel, the Ethenel Cube has been moved|to the Zoomstone menu. <color_white>

173.……<cs_pchero>は 水の中に落ちた 赤い宝石を|おそるおそる 拾いあげ: ...<cs_pchero> fearfully picks up the red|jewel that fell into the water.

175.……しかし しばらく 見つめていたら|不思議と 文字の意味が わかるようになった: ...But after staring at it for a while, their|meaning slowly became understood.|<pc> read the inscription.

176.「……じつは ふたりほど 心当たりがある。: ...I have two such cases in mind.

178.「ボクたちの目的は そこの彼が| 気球に乗る前に 置いてってくれた| 荷物の中に: Our goal was in the luggage he left for us|before our little balloon ride....

179.「そうだ！ ルシェンダさま。| 彼の荷物は 無事ですか？| ピュージュが 狙って: Oh, right! Lushenda, is his luggage safe?|It looked like Pyuju was after it...

180.「ねえ！ いいこと 思いついたよ～♪| 彼のむくろを この儀式の 供物にしよう♪: Hey! I've got a great idea! Let's make his|corpse into an offering for this ceremony!
